: : SharpClaw : :
They arrived in the med bay, and SharpClaw got KitKat onto a table.
SharpClaw: Ok so your a good warrior. If your levels drop to low, you die, and you wont be a warrior anymore.
SharpClaw starts to work on her wounds.
SharpClaw: After years of field combat I picked up some med skills.
 raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:KitKat::

She held onto SharpClaw's shoulder as she walked. Her levels were 
down to 10%.  Her optics flickered as sher levels dropped. "I am not 
acting, so watch your tongue there..bot.  I am a warrior. I shall 
fight to the end of my energon levels. "  She groaned and leaned 
forward. She had to hold tightly to SharpClaw so she didn't fall to 
the floor. She tried to straighten up as she walked. Her walk changed 
to more to a stumble forward. Her levels dropped to 8%. "I need the 
med bay. Now would be preferrable."




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : SharpClaw : :
> SharpClaw helps Destructor to the CR tank, and then returns to 
KitKat. He sees her double over.
> SharpClaw: Your more injured then your letting on. Let me help you. 
You dont need to keep up the act around friends.
> SharpClaw put her arm over his shoulder, and did the same so he 
could help her walk.
> SharpClaw: I take it we'll be going to the med bay untill a tank is 
open.
>  raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:KitKat::
> 
> She looked at SharpClaw after he kissed her cheek. She didn't 
> understand how bots could be emotional when a war was going on. She 
> smirked at him. "Uh, yeah, anyway, no I do not need attention. But 
> Destructor here needs it more than me. He took a pit of a beating. 
> Get him to the chamber first. I'll take the second one."
> 
> She took a step and fell to her knees, holding her stomach were 4 
> wounds were leaking heavily.  She groaned loudly and checked her 
> level. 15% and dropping. Breathing heavy she got up and started to 
> walk, rather wobbly to the maintenance bay.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > 
> > : : SharpClaw : :
> > SharpClaw climbed out of the resteration tank, and headed over to 
> KitKat.
> > SharpClaw: I'm glad to know that you can joke, and not always be 
> buisness. I dont usually say this to anyone, but thank you for 
> getting me back here.
> > SharpClaw kissed KitKat on her cheak.
> > SharpClaw: Now I thank you may need some medical attention 
yourself.
> >  raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:KitKat::
> > 
> > She looked to Destructor. "You take the next CR chamber. I will 
> hold 
> > out untill another one is available." Her levels were dropping 
> > rapidly.  She opened her comlink to SharpClaw. "Hey, lazy bolts, 
> you 
> > aobut done with that chamber, we have wounded bots that need it. 
> > There are only so many chambers you know." she said, with a 
slight 
> > chuckle in her voice. She groaned softly as her wounds almost 
> caused 
> > her to double over.
> >
